lead_paragraph: The Associated Press-GfK poll on Hillary Rodham Clinton was conducted by GfK Public Affairs and Corporate Communications April 23-27. It is based on online interviews of 1,077 adults who are members of GfK's nationally representative KnowledgePanel.

headline.main: How the AP-GfK Poll on Hillary Clinton Was Conducted
headline.print_headline: How the AP-GfK Poll on Hillary Clinton Was Conducted
